plot: An honest police inspector (Navin Nischal) is killed by Raiszada Narsingh (Amrish Puri) and his henchman, Dhansukh (Paresh Rawal). Raiszada frames Rajeshwarnath (Anupam Kher) for this ...
title: Samundar
